title: BACKYARD / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY barks apartment

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Of course I've thought about quitt..."
dialogueTree.english: "Of course I've thought about quitting but... for what?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Oczywiście, że myślałem o rzuceniu, ale... po co?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Вядома, што я думаў пра тое, каб кінуць, але... для чаго?"

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Not everything that needs to be sa..."
dialogueTree.english: "Not everything that needs to be said, needs to be heard."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie wszystko, co musi zostać powiedziane, musi zostać usłyszane”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Не ўсё, што павінна быць сказана, павінна быць пачута".

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Deep down everyone is lonely.""
Smoker on the Balcony: ""All *real* connections begin in th..."
Smoker on the Balcony: ""I don't have clients, only friends.""
Smoker on the Balcony: ""Scary how many people don't have *..."
dialogueTree.english: "Scary how many people don't have *anyone* to talk to."
dialogueTree.polish: „To straszne, jak wiele osób nie ma *nikogo*, z kim mogłyby porozmawiać”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Гэта жахліва, колькі людзей не мае *нікога*, з кім яны маглі б пагаварыць".
